questions.question: In menopause there is atrophic vaginitis.
Perimenopause is 3 years before and 1 year after menopause.
Hot flushes occur in about 5% of menopausal women.
Postmenopausal atrophic vaginitis may be due to decrease in estrogen.
Calcium is one of the general lines of treatment of menopause.
Antenatal care is part of preventive obstetrics.
The first trimester of pregnancy is from 12-28 week gestation.
Urine analysis is one of routine investigation of antenatal care.
Sonar is valuable in first visit of antenatal care.
Pregnant woman must decrease water intake.
Folic acid must be used during first 12-week of pregnancy.
Lochia is the uterine discharge during pregnancy.
Offensive lochia indicates infection.
Lochia is a pathological condition.
The first stage of lochia is lochia serosa.
Sudden suppression of lochia is beneficial.
Post natal care program is of no value.
Persist of vaginal bleeding for 6 weeks after delivery is normal.
Health education is of no value in post-natal care.
The choice of method of contraception is not of the aims of postnatal care.
The first visit after labour is of value.
Macrosomia is one of complications of postterm pregnancy.
In postterm pregnancy the nails is below finger tips.
In postterm pregnancy there is excessive vernix.
In postterm pregnancy the skin is dry.
Postpartum hemorrhage is one of complications of anemia with pregnancy.
Anemia means increased hematocrit value.
Folic acid deficiency anemia is the commonest type of anemia in pregnancy.
In iron deficiency anemia MCV decrease.
Ferrous salts can be used for treatment of iron deficiency anemia.
We can use parentral iron for treatment of iron deficiency anemia with pregnancy.
We can use oral iron for treatment of iron deficiency anemia with malabsorption.
Iron deficiency anemia is macrocytic anemia.
Vesicular mole is one of the causes of DIC in pregnancy.
In DIC bleeding time is decreased.
Most of tocolytic drugs are vasodilators.
Beta-adrenergic agonists can be a tocolytic drug.
Macrosomia is increase of fetal weight more than 3kg.
Mini OGTT is done at 16-22w.
Fasting blood glucose level is normally below 140 mg%.
The main item in ANC to control D.M. is diet and insulin.
The baby of diabetic mother is red, plethoric and moon face.
With baby of diabetic mother there is no congenital anomalies.
Premature rupture of membrane occurs before beginning of labour pains.
Postnatal care is preventive obstetrics.
The first visit in postnatal care is after one month postpartum.
The most important cause of puerperal pyrexia is puerperal sepsis.
Mastitis is one of the causes of puerperal pyrexia.
Accumulation of milk in breast is called breast abscess.
W.B.C is not increased in mastitis.
Suppression of lactation is mandatory in treatment of breast abscess.
Suppression of lactation can be done with increase suckling.
Subinvolution is failure of uterus to regain its normal non-pregnant size.
Polyhydramnios can do premature rupture of membrane.
pH of amniotic fluid is acidic.
